<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2009</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Listening Strategies:A visit to the dentist.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörender Strategies:A Besuch zum Zahnarzt.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visite d'écoute de Strategies:A au dentiste.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visita escutando de Strategies:A ao dentista.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chiamata ascoltante di Strategies:A al dentista.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίσκεψη Strategies:A ακούσματος στον οδοντίατρο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visita de Strategies:A que escucha al dentista.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet where English students improve their vocabulary related to a vistit to the dentist , and learn words which they may also encounter in listening comprehension exercises. Includes some translation to hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dentists</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, in dem englische Kursteilnehmer 
ihren Wortschatz verbessern, der auf einem vistit zum Zahnarzt in 
Verbindung gestanden wird, und erlernt Wörter, die sie in hörenden 
Erfassenübungen auch antreffen können. Schließt irgendeine 
Übersetzung zum Hebräer ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau où les étudiants anglais améliorent 
leur vocabulaire lié à un vistit au dentiste, et apprend les mots 
qu'ils peuvent également rencontrer dans des exercices d'écoute de 
compréhension. Inclut une certaine traduction à l'hébreu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha onde os estudantes ingleses melhorem seu
vocabulário relacionado a um vistit ao dentista, e aprende as 
palavras que podem também encontrar em exercícios escutando da 
compreensão. Inclui alguma tradução ao hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro in cui gli allievi inglesi 
migliorano il loro vocabolario relativo ad un vistit al dentista ed 
impara le parole che possono anche incontrare nelle esercitazioni 
ascoltanti di comprensione. Include una certa traduzione ad 
ebreo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας όπου οι αγγλικοί 
σπουδαστές βελτιώνουν το λεξιλόγιό τους σχετικό με ένα vistit
στον οδοντίατρο, και μαθαίνουν τις λέξεις που μπορούν επίσης να 
αντιμετωπίσουν στις ασκήσεις κατανόησης ακούσματος. 
Περιλαμβάνει κάποια μετάφραση στα εβραϊκά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo donde los estudiantes ingleses
mejoran su vocabulario relacionado con un vistit al dentista, y 
aprende las palabras que pueden también encontrar en ejercicios de la
comprensión que escuchan. Incluye una cierta traducción al 
hebreo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahnärzte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dentistes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dentistas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dentisti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οδοντίατροι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dentistas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
